name: Senna Oaks Spaceship Trip
description:
--- Objective ---
Fly Senna Oaks damaged spaceship while the controls are gradually failing.

--- Controls ---
Use the on-screen inputs to steer, roll, flip your ship as well as shooting your cannons for propulsions.

--- About ---
Made by NekuSoul and Glimmer
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020
